title: Is LAIA an acronym? If yes, what does it stand for? - Quora

response.answer_text: LAIA as an acronym stands for “Latin American Integration Association”. The organisation was founded in 1980, in conclusion of the 1980 Montevideo treaty, and is the successor organisation to the “Latin American Free Trade Association”. Its member countries include Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Cuba, Ecuador, Mexico, Paraguay, Panama, Peru, Uruguay and Venezuela. Thank you for the question.

LAIA is an acronym with several possibilities. Latin American Integration Association, Lake Area Industry Alliance, Lake Charles, LA., Lung and Asthma Information Agency St. George's Hospital Medical School; UK., Langile Abertzaleen Iraultzarako Alderdia in Spain., Leukocyte Adherence Inhibitory Activity, immunology. It can also be the name for a girl. Laia is of Catalan origin and means “well spoken”.
